content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals cos open parentheses x plus pi over 6 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. The solutions to which of the following equations on the interval <math alttext="0 less or equal than x less or equal than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are the solutions to <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 1 half"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on the interval <math alttext="0 less or equal than x less or equal than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="square root of 3 cos x minus sin x equals 1"><semantics><mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="square root of 3 cos x plus sin x equals 1"><semantics><mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="square root of 3 sin x minus cos x equals 1"><semantics><mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="square root of 3 sin x plus cos x equals 1"><semantics><mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="square root of 3 cos x minus sin x equals 1"><semantics><mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
